note: Steve Diederich has hoovered-up all things electronic since getting his first Radio Shack Battery Card. The VintNerd gives Steve an excuse to nerd out on OG retro tech and an opportunity to share this wayback journey with fellow 'nerds of vintage' all over the world. Regardless of what sparked your passion for 8-bits, 16-bits, and other bits -- 80s Atari, Commodore, TI, Radio Shack and others are never in short supply over at The VintNerd studio. Watch The VintNerd on YouTube. Happy Nerding!

name: YouTube
value: https://youtube.com/TheVintNerd
